title: test printing
content:
Can anyone recommend a laser printer for high res testing? I just found this thread...

[http://typophile.com/node/15453](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013183834/http:/typophile.com/node/15453 "http://typophile.com/node/15453")

...but the verdict doesn't seem to be in. It's also a year since that discussion.

I've got an Epson Stylus 2200 at my disposal, but I understand I'd need RIP software and the right paper to get the best results.
author: silas

comments.content:
Actually, there was a thread not long ago. It is still on page 1:

[http://typophile.com/node/28566](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013183834/http:/typophile.com/node/28566 "http://typophile.com/node/28566")
